argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_xrsbas | |- RR* = ( Base ` RR*s ) |
| 2 |  | #P_xrsadd | |- +e = ( +g ` RR*s ) |
| 3 |  | #P_xrs0 | |- 0 = ( 0g ` RR*s ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( invg ` RR*s ) = ( invg ` RR*s ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_grpinvval | |- ( B e. RR* -> ( ( invg ` RR*s ) ` B ) = ( iota_ x e. RR* ( x +e B ) = 0 ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_xnegcl | |- ( B e. RR* -> -e B e. RR* ) |
| 7 |  | #P_xaddeq0 | |- ( ( x e. RR* /\ B e. RR* ) -> ( ( x +e B ) = 0 <-> x = -e B ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_ancoms | |- ( ( B e. RR* /\ x e. RR* ) -> ( ( x +e B ) = 0 <-> x = -e B ) ) |
| 9 | 6, 8 | #P_riota5 | |- ( B e. RR* -> ( iota_ x e. RR* ( x +e B ) = 0 ) = -e B ) |
| 10 | 5, 9 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( B e. RR* -> ( ( invg ` RR*s ) ` B ) = -e B ) |
